game.name: Ogu and the Secret Forest
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 탐험 모자를 쓴 아기 오구와 함께 새로운 세계를 탐험하세요! 귀여운 캐릭터들과 수많은 비밀이 가득한 세계에서 새로운 친구들을 사귀고, 적을 물리치며 수수께끼를 풀어보세요
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore the wonderful world with baby Ogu! 'Ogu and the Secret Forest' is a 2D adventure game with hand-drawn characters and various types of puzzles. Befriend bouncy characters and defeat strange creatures to unravel the mystery of the charming world.

reviewHighlights.text: No if you're over 16. This game is very tedious-feeling because it's very easy and takes a very long time to navigate around. It is a very easy Zelda-...
